 Expiré (Expired)

#### Organization Information
- **Name (English)**: Kacendra Dion
- **Address (English)**: 1200 chemin Montréal, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R6, Canada
- **Contact Information (English)**: Phone: 438-324-8125, Email: [kacendra.dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca](mailto:kacendra.dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Details
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) seeks a Portable Emissions Measurement System to measure the concentration of certain species in the exhaust gas of heavy-duty vehicles, engines, and equipment. The System will be used in the heavy-duty engine laboratory at NRC's Ottawa Montreal Road campus and in-use applications outside of the laboratory.

#### Desired System Features
- Certification grade
- Portable and lightweight
- Capable of measuring concentration of several species
